requirement.title: Take-Off
requirement.description: The airplane MUST be able to be launched by a single person by throwing the plane.

requirement.title: Climbing
requirement.description: The airplane MUST climb to a altitude of $\SI{50 \pm 5}{\meter}$ above ground after launch and circle the launch site at this altitude with a radius of $\SI{30 \pm 10}{\meter}$.

requirement.title: Mission
requirement.description: The airplane MUST follow a predefined set of waypoints, consisting of latitude, longitude and altitude. Each waypoint MUST be traversed with a tolerance of $\pm\SI{5}{\meter}$ both horizontally and vertically at a predefined velocity (tolerance $\pm 25\%$).

requirement.title: Landing
requirement.description: The airplane MUST be able to land at a predefined landing zone with a length of at least $\SI{50}{\meter}$ and a width of at least $\SI{4}{\meter}$.

requirement.title: Range
requirement.description: The minimum range of the aircraft MUST be 100km.

requirement.title: Error Handling
requirement.description: The airplane MUST provide flight information when on the ground and during loitering.
